author: By Jeremy B. White, Carla Marinucci, Graph Massara and Aaron Leathley
title: NEWSOM to talk REOPENING — CADEM’s HICKS blasted over BAUMAN report — GRENELL denies SCHIFF — MCCARTHY pushes PELOSI on opening HOUSE
content:
Presented by Last Chance Alliance
THE BUZZ So much comes down to testing.
Gov. Gavin Newsom has promised us more detail today on his broad six-point framework for California emerging from a coronavirus-induced lockdown.Those prerequisites include the state … [+15848 chars]
